verses.name: Acts 13:12
verses.text: Then the deputy, when he saw what was done, believed, being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord.

verses.name: Acts 13:13
verses.text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos, they came to Perga in Pamphylia: and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem.

verses.name: Acts 13:14
verses.text: But when they departed from Perga, they came to Antioch in Pisidia, and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and sat down.

verses.name: Acts 13:15
verses.text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them, saying, Ye men and brethren, if ye have any word of exhortation for the people, say on.
